bug.short_desc: DateChooserButton default icon not included in build

long_desc.thetext:
By default, DateChooserButton uses an icon of 'icon/16/apps/accessories-date.png' if one is not supplied.
When you do a "make build" this icon is not included in the resources copied to the built script, so the button comes up blank.
The workaround in your application code is to add:
/* #embed(qx.icontheme/16/apps/accessories-date.png) */
to the class that uses the DateChooserButton. However, it would be much better if the DateChooserButton included this line itself.
Hugh
